title: What is the best way to revise physical chemistry? - JEE HUB - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all you need to make notes of physical chemistry by your own by taking refference from different books ( if you not make it yet ) like this one👇 Firstly if you not prepare ur notes then first make notes of physical chemistry by taking every important point from diff books like 👇 Firstly if you not prepare ur notes then first make notes of physical chemistry by taking every important point from diff books like 👇 Firstly if you not prepare ur notes then first make notes of physical chemistry by taking every important point from diff books like 👇  Solid state.  Gaseous states of matter. Then revise those notes only . One advantage of using notes made by you is that it's takes short time to revise and recapitulate .so I will suggest u to make notes then do revision from those notes repeated number of times . Plss don't mind if there is any grammatical mistakes 🙏.
The best way to revise the physical chemistry is to list up the formulas and you should practice at least one hard question on it to clear concept…
